description: Variation of Conditions 2 (materials and external surfaces), 5 (tree protection), and 6 (landscape scheme) of planning permission ref. 43419/APP/2016/3197, dated 10-11-2016 for the 'Variation of condition 3 (approved drawings) of application 43419/APP/2014/3879 (Erection of two detached houses with dormers and integral garages, new crossovers and associated external works (involving demolition of the existing house) to allow for the addition of a basement to both properties and alterations to the elevations of the approved dwellings)'. Amendment seeks removal of three conditions (2, 5, and 6) that were not discharged prior to commencement of the completed development.
decision_conditions: The application failed to demonstrate what trees were on-site before development, what trees were protected and retained and what trees were removed. It also failed to demonstrate how the planted trees appropriately mitigated the value lost by any tree removals. Accordingly, the application, as submitted, is contrary to Paragraph 136 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy G7 of The London Plan (2021), and Policy DMHB 14 of Hillingdon Council's Local Plan Part Two Development Management Policies (2020) and conditions 5 and 6 of 43419/APP/2016/3197 cannot yet be removed.

The application failed to submit appropriate enclosure/boundary treatment and finished levels/contour details to demonstrate how the development preserves and enhances the area's visual amenities in accordance with condition 6 of 43419/APP/2016/3197. In the absence of sufficient details, the application is contrary to Policy D3 of The London Plan (2021), Policy BE1 of Hillingdon Council's Local Plan Part 1 Strategic Policies (2012), and Policy DMHB 11 of Hillingdon Council's Local Plan Part Two Development Management Policies (2020) and condition 6 cannot yet be removed.
